concept.title: Remove Objects
concept.shortdesc: Removes objects using one of the following methods:

ul.li: Cut the selected objects to the clipboard.
Press DELETE to remove the selected objects.
You can use ERASEcommand to delete objects, whatever the methods you use to select objects.
To restore the deleted objects, use UNDO command.
OOPS, the command can restore objects deleted with the ERASE, BLOCK or WBLOCK command.
To delete mark of plus sign (point mark), perform REDRAW command to refresh thescreen.
To delete unused named objects, such as block definition, dimension style, layer, linetype and text style, perform PURGE command.
